flowchart LR
    subgraph AXI["AXI4 Master Interface"]
        AW["AW Channel"]
        W["W Channel"]
        B["B Channel"]

    subgraph axi4_master_wr_mon["axi4_master_wr_mon"]
        subgraph Frontend["AXI4 Frontend"]
            FE["Signal capture\nProtocol decode"]
        end

        subgraph Monitor["axi_monitor_base"]
            MON["Transaction tracking\nTimeout detection\nEvent generation"]
        end

        subgraph Filter["axi_monitor_filtered"]
            FILT["Packet filtering"]
        end
    end

    subgraph Output["Monitor Bus"]
        MONBUS["monbus_packet[63:0]"]
    end

    AW --> Frontend
    W --> Frontend
    B --> Frontend
    Frontend --> Monitor
    Monitor --> Filter
    Filter --> MONBUS
repo_description: This site is hopefully a springboard for others to learn about coding in System Verilog and experimenting with FPGAs.

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 让我们从头开始，先确定入口点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 好的，那就按这个方案。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 这个系统主要由"AXI4 Master Interface"、"AW Channel"组成。

dialogue.utterance: 从结构上看，我们有"W Channel"、"B Channel"。

dialogue.utterance: 让我澄清一下，"W Channel"、"B Channel"的作用是...

dialogue.utterance: 明白了，"axi4_master_wr_mon"、"AXI4 Frontend"就这样设计。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我们需要确保这个逻辑是正确的。

dialogue.utterance: "Signal capture\nProtocol decode"负责具体的功能实现。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我们应该如何处理"axi_monitor_base"？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 这个设计看起来不错。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 你能详细说明一下"Transaction tracking\nTimeout detection\nEvent generation"、"axi_monitor_filtered"吗？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 相较于方案A，"Transaction tracking\nTimeout detection\nEvent generation"、"axi_monitor_filtered"有更好的性能。
